name: Yellow submarine (Kavinceky, Biscke, Ki0c, OctoClo, timdhoffmann, Corsaire, You-Jeen Mette, Lutwidge, Soul404)
name_original: Yellow submarine (Kavinceky, Biscke, Ki0c, OctoClo, timdhoffmann, Corsaire, You-Jeen Mette, Lutwidge, Soul404)
description:
Inside a small yellow submarine, explore the depths of the ocean! Collect fishes and admire the environment. Use a Wiimote to control your submarine!

The game is also playable with a keyboard. In order to play with the keyboard, press i on the keyboard once the level is loaded.

The project was created during a 5-days workshop about connected objects for players with mental disabilities at the French public video game school Cnam-Enjmin. A physical replica of the digital submarine (with a Wiimote controller hidden inside) was built to serve as a motion controller.
